def_cn: 随乐声抢椅子的游戏(游戏者随乐声围着椅子绕圈走，乐声停止时未抢到椅子者被淘汰)
def_en: Musical chairs is a game that children play at parties. They run round a row of chairs while music plays and try to sit down on one when the music stops.

def_cn: (像抢椅子游戏似的)人员频繁的更动，频繁调换职位
def_en: If you describe the situation within a particular organization or area of activity as musical chairs, you are critical of the fact that people in that organization or area exchange jobs or positions very often.
